name: Git Keep File
summary: Learn about .GITKEEP files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: The file extension ".gitkeep" is not a part of the official Git standard but has come about by convention with some Git users. The extension name is considered a good choice because it is the opposite of .GITIGNORE, which is an official Git file extension that tells Git which files to ignore when committing to the repository.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
